profileAlternative.name: Anand Mangalam
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Scientist at J.P. Morgan
profileAlternative.summary: My expertise is in market risk and credit risk models for fixed income securities, business banking and mortgage banking credit portfolios. In my current role at JP Morgan I build and deploy loss forecasting models across all asset classes under Asset & Wealth Management portfolio. I had a short tenure at DTCC, where I was building market risk models such as Value-at-Risk (VaR), Stressed VaR and Sensitivity VaR in the fixed income space.

aboutAlternative.text: My expertise is in market risk and credit risk models for fixed income securities, business banking and mortgage banking credit portfolios. In my current role at JP Morgan I build and deploy loss forecasting models across all asset classes under Asset & Wealth Management portfolio. I had a short tenure at DTCC, where I was building market risk models such as Value-at-Risk (VaR), Stressed VaR and Sensitivity VaR in the fixed income space.

given.text: Chenjie came to JP Morgan as summer intern in CCAR Risk Modeling and Analytics group. She has a strong background in financial modeling and statistical computing platforms such as R. Within a short span of two months she very well imbibed the logic behind loss forecasting. She is a quick learner and detail oriented. She has done an excellent work here in JP Morgan & Chase Credit Risk modeling See less
